member.name: T:MassTransit.QuartzIntegration.Configuration.SchedulerBusObserver
member.summary: Used to start and stop an in-memory scheduler using Quartz

member.name: M:MassTransit.QuartzIntegration.MassTransitJobFactory`1.CreatePayloadHeaderString(Quartz.Spi.TriggerFiredBundle)
member.summary: Some additional properties from the TriggerFiredBundle There is a bug in RabbitMq.Client that prevents using the DateTimeOffset type in the headers These values are being serialized as ISO-8601 round trip string
